Actions.Name: Redondo
Actions.Description: Swap places with an adjacent ally, removing and placing both characters.

Actions.Name: Cleave
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes adjacent to the [name] or its attack target take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Bull Rush
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 1. An adjacent character when it finishes its movement is either weakened or shoved 1.
